name: Jewelry Bonney

trigger.text: If you have 1 or less Life cards, rest up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 7 or less.

text: On Play: If your Leader has the (Egghead) type, this Character gains Rush. Then, your opponent adds the top card of their Life cards to their hand.

effect.text: If your Leader has the (Egghead) type, this Character gains Rush. Then, your opponent adds the top card of their Life cards to their hand.
If you have 1 or less Life cards, rest up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 7 or less.
